Container.Name: Bind9
Container.Overview: Bind9 nameserver with Webmin WebUI. Simple lightweight DNS for local network. Default WebUI username is: admin and password: difficult You can change it by docker variables.
Container.Changes: # 2021-07-27 # * Fixed cleaning after pkgs installations # 2021-07-23 # * Fixed RNDC scripts # 2021-07-12 # * First release
Container.Description:
Bind9 with Webmin WebUI. Simple DNS for local network.
Username and password could by changed by GUI_USER and GUI_PASSWORD ENV variables.
You simply can change GUI port, by modyfing WebUI Host Port.

Config.Name: Bind Config
Config.Description: Where Your DNS Server should store persistant configs

Config.Name: DNS TCP Port
Config.Description: DNS Listening TCP Port, this is used for dns queries

Config.Name: DNS UDP Port
Config.Description: DNS Listening UDP Port, this is used for dns queries

Config.Name: Username
Config.Description: This is WebUI Username for managing DNS Default: admin

Config.Name: Password
Config.Description: This is WebUI password for managing DNS. Default: dificult
